trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Longview
There were no other sightings in Longview on or around April 5th 2012
Summary: Boomerang shaped UFO over Longview Texas
divs: Sighting Details I was heading Eastward on I-20 at 8:30 P.M. on Thursday the 5th of April 2012. I was passing thru Longview Texas just West of the Eastman plant when I noticed an aircraft traveling from North to South passing over me. Altitude was about 2000 feet I would estimate. I first noticed it by the lights it carried, some solid and some blinking. Nothing exceptional there. I happened to be just under it when it passed over, and was able to clearly see the outline of its body, what I called a chevron at the moment but others might call a boomerang. Its flight was steady and straight, could not hear it as I was in vehicle. Speed was not noteworthy, about what you would expect of jet aircraft. When I saw the shape of the vehicle I knew it was unconventional, and NO it was not a stealth fighter or stealth bomber. I strongly feel this is probably U.S. hardware we are not yet informed of just like Stealth technology a few years ago.
